label: role
comment: A role, expressed as text, for this contact person.
A role, expressed as text, for this trade party.
A role, expressed as text, of this representative person.
A role, expressed as text, of this transport person.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.
An individual human being acting as a representative.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
A transport related person, such as a member of a crew or a passenger.
